articles.title: Falmouth to vote on turning historic golf course into solar farm
articles.description:
At next Monday’s Town Meeting, residents will decide the future of the long-standing Cape Cod course, with part of the land set aside for conservation.

The post Falmouth to vote on turning historic golf course into solar farm appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Falmouth residents will vote on November 13 to convert a historic golf course into a solar farm.
Part of the land will be designated for conservation to protect local ecosystems.
The decision could influence renewable energy initiatives and land use in Cape Cod.

articles.title: Look inside Sheraton Boston’s whimsical new Goodnight Moon suite
articles.description:
The stay is available through Feb. 28, 2026.

The post Look inside Sheraton Boston’s whimsical new Goodnight Moon suite appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Sheraton Boston unveils Goodnight Moon suite, inspired by the classic children's book.
The suite is available for bookings until February 28, 2026.
Local families can enjoy a unique themed experience in the heart of Boston.

articles.title: 2 kilos of fentanyl recovered after investigation into Southwest Corridor drug activity, police say
articles.description:
The fentanyl was recovered as police executed search warrants in Dorchester, Mattapan, and Roxbury.

The post 2 kilos of fentanyl recovered after investigation into Southwest Corridor drug activity, police say appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Police recovered 2 kilos of fentanyl during a drug investigation in Boston neighborhoods.
Search warrants were executed in Dorchester, Mattapan, and Roxbury on November 10, 2025.
This operation aims to reduce drug-related crime and improve community safety in Boston.

articles.title: 2 MBTA operators sent to hospital after fallen wire causes fire near BC
articles.description:
The two operators, who were on the out-of-service train at the time, were taken to a local hospital for smoke inhalation.

The post 2 MBTA operators sent to hospital after fallen wire causes fire near BC appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Two MBTA operators hospitalized for smoke inhalation after fire caused by fallen wire.
Incident occurred near Boston College on November 10, 2025.
MBTA service disruptions may affect local commuters in the area.

articles.title: Abandoned manor overlooking the ocean gets new life in Nahant — thanks to Instagram
articles.description:
Presiding over the coast, this historic and stately Queen Anne had fallen victim to vandals. Now its revived and listed for $5.5 million.

The post Abandoned manor overlooking the ocean gets new life in Nahant — thanks to Instagram appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Historic Queen Anne manor in Nahant restored after years of vandalism.
Property listed for $5.5 million, attracting potential buyers and interest.
Restoration highlights community efforts and boosts local real estate appeal.
